dict.acceptation: 更，更多；达到或处于更大的范围或程度；此外，更加；
更多的；(many)的比较级；附加的，额外的；
更多的或附加的人或事物；

sent.orig: The number of people who quit their jobs and begin SOHOs should increase more and.
sent.trans: more.为了从事SOHO而辞去在公司的工作的人数应该会越来越多。

sent.orig: More belongings, more sex, more status, more power, more recognition, more, more, more.
sent.trans: 更多的物品，更多的性别，更地位，更多的权力，更多的认识，更多，更多，更多。

sent.orig: More and more i feel i am lucky to own him.he became more and more muture.
sent.trans: 我越来越感觉到我很幸运能够拥有他，他变的越来越成熟。

sent.orig: As he talked with more and more gusto, we came more and more under his spell.
sent.trans: 他越说越起劲，大家越听越入神。

sent.orig: There were no more doubts, no more arguments, no more pain, no more fear.
sent.trans: 不再有怀疑，不再有争论，不再有痛苦，不再有恐惧。
